messages:
WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in nominative plural WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in accusative singular WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in accusative plural WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in genitive singular WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in genitive plural WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in illative singular WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in illative plural WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in locative singular WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in locative plural WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in comitative singular WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in comitative plural WORDFORM is inflected as an even-syllabic noun in essive WORDFORM has even-syllabic stem WORDFORM has uneven-syllabic stem WORDFORM has contract stem WORDFORM gets –včči- and is then inflected as an even-syllabic stem. WORDFORM gets –včče. WORDFORM gets –ž- and is then inflected as an uneven-syllabic stem. Weak grade. WORDFORM gets –eažža- and is then inflected as an even-syllabic stem. WORDFORM gets the suffix –eš. WORDFORM gets –š- and is then inflected as an uneven-syllabic stem. Weak grade. WORDFORM gets the suffix –še. Weak grade. WORDFORM has uneven-syllabic stem and no consonant gradation. WORDFORM has contract stem and no consonant gradation. WORDFORM shall be in nominative singular. WORDFORM shall be in nominative plural. WORDFORM shall be in accusative singular. WORDFORM shall be in accusative plural. WORDFORM shall be in genitive singular. WORDFORM shall be in genitive plural. WORDFORM shall be in illativ singular. WORDFORM shall be in illativ plural. WORDFORM shall be in locative singular. WORDFORM shall be in locative plural. WORDFORM shall be in comitative singular. WORDFORM shall be in comitative plural. WORDFORM shall be in essive.
Extra strong grade. without consonant gradation. without visible consonant gradation. and shall have strong grade. and shall have weak grade.
Diphthong simplification in the penultimate syllable. Remember diphthong simplification. Remember diphthong simplification and a > i. The attributive form is identical to the predicative form.
-it is deleted. -as is deleted. Vowel change u > o. t > g + a. t > g + at. t > hk + ii. is > á. oš > o. š > ž. s > ss + ii. ái > á. i > j. Vowel change a > i. Vowel change e > i. Vowel change e > á. Vowel change i > á. Vowel change o > u. Remember oš > u. š > šš + ii. Consonant change n > m. Consonant change t > g. Consonant change t > h. Consonant change t > d. Consonant change t > b. Consonant change h > t. Consonant change d > t. Remember i > e. Vowel change a > e. Vowel change a > á. Stem consonant: g. Stem consonant: n. Stem consonant: m. Consonant change š > čča. Consonant change š > žž + ii. Consonant change š > žž + i. Consonant change š > žž and the suffix -an. Consonant change š > žž + a. Consonant change t > hk and the suffix -an. -ss- and the suffix -an. Consonant change š > šš and the suffix -an. Consonant change š > čč and the suffix –as. Consonant change š > čč and the suffix -ain. Consonant change t > g and the suffix –as.
